Articles.Content:
Hi there!

I present to you the MAW's newest design, the "APC!"creativity overload

It does nothing, but transports 8 kerbals (including driver) from point A to point B. It protects its passengers from landmines, atomic blasts, and ion cannon shots(actual test results may vary).

It's not meant to be amphibious (however, I didn't test it), therefore it has no propulsion while swimming.

This is the first version, with no turret, weaponry and other things (as MAW produces only stock vehicles, these things would be purely decorational).

TIP: Have at least one kerbal sitting on one of the seats, as the APC inverts controls if it's unmanned.

Stats:

Top speed: ~24,5 m/s or ~88 km/h

Weight: 9,9 tons

Propulsion: Eletric, 8 wheel drive

Part count: 194 don't try it on granny's typewriter

Action groups: [1] - Changes steering mode

And here are some pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Download link:

Click here

Have fun!

Edited January 21, 2014 by jmiki8
Can it float like the WW2 DUCK?

Can it float like the WW2 DUCK?

Sorry, but unfortunately not.

It's not meant to be amphibious (however, I didn't test it), therefore it has no propulsion while swimming.

But I will improve it so it could maybe in the future. This is the first version.
